Subject: Reminder: Connect for Health Invite | Building Micro Habits in the New Year
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

As a gentle reminder, if you have not done so already, please register for our webinar. 
If you are having trouble viewing this email view online <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FF9BxCBRk0iDvBJnI6hmS2qJPu%3Fdomain%3Dapp2.comms.cigna.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca96d98471b504735fafd08dd2e393581%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638717545421364119%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=VYJCFBOYNA5Ojy5mDOtQ8bAvusa8vSL4oDyS2VuGtQQ%3D&reserved=0> 	  	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bb0866b45-7b1a-4c0e-a929-c9cd7c591ed5%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_pos_rgb.png>

11-beae8a8acb3a%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_rev_rgb.png> 
 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bf468fc1f-c93a-4f6e-8f20-450a8e92f17b%7D_cfh-generic-header-july23.png> 	

ConnectforHealth 

Your invite to Cigna Healthcare's wellbeing webinar series 

At Cigna Healthcare, we recognize the importance of prioritizing your health and wellbeing. As your health and wellness partner, we are fully committed to helping you establish healthy habits. 

You are invited to join Cigna Healthcare’s Connect for Health webinar on: 

Building Micro Habits 

We want to help you make 2025 your healthiest year yet! Discover how small habits can stick and lead to big changes that help improve your health. Our expert will share some helpful tips to boost your well-being in 2025 and beyond. 

 	  	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bc126220d-91e1-40d2-b6cb-df0b6286d51c%7D_2023-brand-leaf.png> 	 	 Save the date 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bef802401-370c-4712-9218-60c559e443ae%7D_calendar.png> 	 	 Date: Wednesday, January 8th 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B140e7be3-ca9e-4dbd-8207-7fd388d309c7%7D_time.png> 	 	 Time: 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM (Gulf Standard Time) 

Click here to register <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FayjaCDJmnfoX0rxSAizSjSn4M%3Fdomain%3Devent.on24.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca96d98471b504735fafd08dd2e393581%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638717545421402143%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=xLjPu1Osg2wTrFYLSuDkNyyecutS3rPhUlykiY0hUxU%3D&reserved=0> 	
 	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bd2b037dd-985a-4980-978a-ff3f319568ea%7D_Nokhez.jpg> 	Nokhez Usama

chunks.text:
UlykiY0hUxU%3D&reserved=0> 	
 	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bd2b037dd-985a-4980-978a-ff3f319568ea%7D_Nokhez.jpg> 	Nokhez Usama 
Behavioral Neuropsychologist 

Drawing from her multicultural background in Africa, the Middle East, and advanced studies in the Netherlands, Nokhez focuses on how stress hormones shape brain structure, cognitive performance, and decision-making. Her work emphasizes translating research into practical frameworks that drive behavioral change, improve self-regulation, and enhance cognitive performance. She is the founder of Mind/Me. 

Through psychoeducation and evidence-based strategies, Nokhez empowers individuals and teams to adopt sustainable habits for emotional well-being and resilience. 

 	 
If you face any problems with registration, please write to us on meacommunications@cigna.com <mailto:meacommunications@cigna.com>
